Description: Build websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React or .NET.
Create apps for iOS and Android using Flutter, React Native, or native tools like Swift and Kotlin.
Design and code interactive games using Unity or Unreal Engine with C# or C++.
Automate deployment, manage cloud infrastructure, and ensure smooth software delivery using Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
Learn to protect systems, networks, and data from digital attacks using ethical hacking and security best practices.
Turn raw data into insights using Excel, SQL, Python (Pandas), and visualization tools like Power BI.
Apply statistics and machine learning to solve real-world problems using Python, Scikit-learn, and Jupyter Notebooks.
Build data pipelines and warehouses to collect, store, and process large-scale data using SQL, Spark, and cloud platforms.
Deploy and scale machine learning models in production using MLOps practices, APIs, and cloud services.
Design user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces using Figma, user research, and design thinking principles.
